Where a child (with special needs or otherwise) cannot find a school place, the NCSE or Tusla will designate a school place for the child
The Bill will require all schools to consult with and inform parents where changes are being made to admissions policies
The Bill will Require all schools to publish their admissions policies and will ban fees relating to admissions
The School Admissions Bill will ban waiting lists, thus ending the discrimination against parents who move in to a new area
